(4th/5th cent. ) Monastic author (or authors) of uncertain identity (he is unlikely to be the Marcian of Theodoret , Historia Philothea [History of the Monks] 3, as Lebon argued). Seven short ascetic texts are transmitted under his name in Syriac, for two of which a Greek original is also known. Sources CPG 3885–3900. J. Lebon ( ed. A. Van Roey), Le moine saint Marcien. Étude critique des sources, édition de ses écrits (1968). A. Van Roey, ‘Marcien’, in DSpir , vol. 10 (1980), 310–1. Sebastian P. Brock
